abilities.title: Stealthy Approach
abilities.text: Each character in this Unit may . Then this Unit may gain or immediately make a focus action. Coordinated Fire: When a character in another allied Ewok Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, before dice are rolled, this Unit may use this ability. If the targeted is within 5 of a character in this Unit, the target Unit gains . Camouflage At the end of Setup, this Unit may gain . Strength in Numbers When a character in this Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, for each other allied Ewok character Engaged with the target that is not Wounded, add 1 die to the attack roll.
